case_data_general_inquiry: SELECT Id, CaseNumber, IsDeleted, ContactId, AccountId, AssetId, SourceId, BusinessHoursId, ParentId, SuppliedName, SuppliedEmail, SuppliedPhone, SuppliedCompany, Type, RecordTypeId, Status, Reason, Origin, Language, Subject, Priority, Description, IsClosed, ClosedDate, IsEscalated, OwnerId, IsClosedOnCreate, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, ContactPhone, ContactMobile, ContactEmail, ContactFax, LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate, Agency__c, Contact_Email__c, Contact_First_Name__c, Contact_Last_Name__c, Contact_Phone__c, Created_Hour__c, Date_Time_Modified__c, Date_Waiting_on_Customer__c, First_Name__c, Knowledge_Article_Attached__c, Last_Name__c, Mission_Area__c, Nature_of_Inquiry__c, Program__c, Customer_Type_Other__c, Customer_Type__c, Escalated__c, Establishment_Number_Prefix__c, Establishment_Number_Suffix__c, Establishment_Number__c, Establishment_Size__c, Form_ID__c, Impacted_Zip_Code__c, Inquiry_Type__c, Is_Assigned_Reviewer_Logged_In_User__c, Issuance_Utilized__c, Logged_In_User_Team__c, Policy_Area__c, QA_Review_Status__c, Queue__c, Random_Number__c, Residue_Violation_Case_No__c, Response_Score__c, Review_Comments__c, Sample_ID__c, Staff_Office_Case__c, SubCat_Other__c, Sub_Category__c, Time_From_Creation__c, Time_From_Last_Update__c, Tone__c, Total_Score__c, askFSIS_Historical__c, Issuance_Usage_Count__c, Supervisor_Feedbaack__c, Owner_Mission_Area__c, askFSIS_Incident_Number_Formula__c, askFSIS_Incident_Number__c, CABH_Indicator__c, Case_Day_of_Week__c, Last_Modified_Date_Time__c, Time_from_Creation2__c, Time_of_First_Response__c, Time_to_First_Response__c, Related_Case__c, Accuracy_Score__c, Apex_Last_Updated__c, CABH_Status_Time__c, Case_Review_CY__c, Case_Review_FY__c, Case_Review_MCY__c, Case_Review_MFY__c, Case_Review_Month__c, Completeness_Score__c, Complexity_Score__c, Skip_Validation_Rule__c, Tone_Score__c, medallia_xm__Medallia_internal_id__c, medallia_xm__PotentialLiability__c, RecordTypeName__c, CaseNotes__c, AskFsis_Master_Case__c, Chat_Key__c, Case_Review_Approver__c, Case_Review_This_FY__c, Case_Work_Time_H_MM__c, Do_Not_Archive__c, Email_Template_Type__c, Establishment_Account__c, Establishment_Number_Full__c, Exclude_from_Monthly_Case_Review__c, FSIS_External__c, Has_Attachment__c, Has_SF_Note__c, Is_International__c, Is_Supervisor_Executive_Logged_In_User__c, KBA_Time__c, Last_Assigning_KBA__c, Last_Requeue_Reason_Note__c, Master_Case__c, Monthly_Case_Review_Status__c, Owner_is_Logged_in_User__c, Previous_Account__c, Previous_Case_Owner_ID__c, Previous_Case_Queue__c, Previous_Contact__c, Previous_Establishment_Size__c, Previous_Status__c, QA_Result_Category__c, QA_Review_Type__c, QA_Score_Complete__c, Review_Completion_Status__c, Review_Status__c, SPHD__c, Staff_Owner__c, Staff_Queue__c, Task_Phone_Time_Added__c, Time_to_First_Response_H_MM__c, Violator_Source_ID_RVT__c, askFSIS_Case_Review__c, Assigned_Reviewer_1_Name__c, Assigned_Reviewer_2_Name__c, KBA_Time_H_MM__c, Total_Case_Time_H_MM__c, Total_Case_Time__c, MissionArea_Agency__c, MissionArea_Agency_Program__c, Case_Owner_M_P__c, Parent_Case_Owner__c, Description_Continued__c, Possible_Knowledge_Article_Gap__c, Technical_Issue__c, Created_Year_Week__c, Preferred_Language__c, Secondary_Mission_Area__c, Secondary_Agency__c, Secondary_Program__c, Preferred_Language_Test__c, State_Test__c FROM Case WHERE (recordtype.name = '(LIA) Lapse in Appropriations' or recordtype.name = 'APHIS Inquiry' or recordtype.name = 'Ask USDA General Inquiry' or recordtype.name = 'Civil Rights Inquiry' or recordtype.name = 'Future Work Inquiry' or recordtype.name = 'NASS Inquiry' or recordtype.name = 'RD Inquiry') AND Case_Owner_M_P__c = false AND (CALENDAR_YEAR(CreatedDate) = 2019 or CALENDAR_YEAR(CreatedDate) = 2020)
case_data_closed: SELECT Id, CaseNumber, RecordTypeId, Status, Origin, subject, Description, Description_Continued__c, CreatedDate, Agency__c, Mission_Area__c, Program__c, Nature_of_Inquiry__c, Resolution_Type__c, Resolution__c, Owner_Mission_Area__c FROM Case where isclosed = true and CreatedDate < 2025-07-01T00:00:00Z and status != 'Closed - SPAM' AND status != 'closed - feedback' AND status != 'closed - transfer' and status != 'Closed - Warm Transfer'
case_article_closed: SELECT Id, CaseId, KnowledgeArticleId, KnowledgeArticleVersionId FROM CaseArticle WHERE case.status != 'Closed - SPAM' AND case.status != 'closed - feedback' AND case.status != 'closed - transfer' AND case.status != 'Closed - Warm Transfer' AND case.isclosed = true AND case.CreatedDate < 2025-07-01T00:00:00Z
